CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: On the other hand , we noted that benzodiathiazole (BT)-or benzoxadiazole (BO)based conjugated polymers are one of the most important organic semiconductors due to their easy preparation , excellent stability , and optoelectronic characteristics , and many efforts have been devoted to the design and synthesis of new BT / BO derivatives.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. Benzodiathiazole (BT)
2. Benzoxadiazole (BO)

These are the names of the organic semiconductors being studied and synthesized in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph:

1. Benzodiathiazole (BT)
2. Benzoxadiazole (BO)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Benzodiathiazole (BT) |
| Benzoxadiazole (BO) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

2. Optoelectronic characteristics
